f33fed3a-ad58-4915-a2b5-eda21e11a112.name: Select level of night vision
f33fed3a-ad58-4915-a2b5-eda21e11a112.notes: 4 is fairly realistic, 9 is perfect, or use infravision

a8474a6f-ddb5-4459-bf0b-1ad735b093a6.name: Pick a role for Goblins in society

c1113c9e-e9d4-4ab4-baa1-6698d1e120ce.name: Greed
c1113c9e-e9d4-4ab4-baa1-6698d1e120ce.notes: Make a self-control roll any time riches are offered – as payment for fair work, gains from adventure, spoils of crime, or just bait. If you fail, you do whatever it takes to get the payoff.

b24360a1-8c9c-494d-a18d-c96d01aee8b3.name: Miserliness
b24360a1-8c9c-494d-a18d-c96d01aee8b3.notes: Make a self-control roll any time you are called on to spend money. If the expenditure is large, this roll may be at -5 or worse (GM’s decision). If you fail, you refuse to spend the money.

b6d7ecaa-a73a-4088-a8cf-076601494a68.name: Obsession
b6d7ecaa-a73a-4088-a8cf-076601494a68.notes: Achieve perfection in chosen profession; Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to deviate from your goal. If you fail, you continue to pursue your Obsession, regardless of the consequences.

2e36598a-db4d-4843-9fe4-bc191b7248d9.name: Impulsiveness
2e36598a-db4d-4843-9fe4-bc191b7248d9.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to wait and ponder. If you fail, you must act

89c27556-a8a4-43f0-a60f-58fc37c9e413.name: Selfish
89c27556-a8a4-43f0-a60f-58fc37c9e413.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you experience a clear social slight or “snub.” On a failure, you lash out at the offending party just as if you had Bad Temper.

features.situation: from others when your Selfishness surfaces

717121ef-c224-4d36-8f6e-a41a1da302fc.name: Impulsiveness
717121ef-c224-4d36-8f6e-a41a1da302fc.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to wait and ponder. If you fail, you must act

features.situation: from past victims and anyone with Empathy
to Interrogation and Intimidation rolls when you use threats or torture

841ff7db-4feb-4054-a0b6-de4fd022982f.name: Impulsiveness
841ff7db-4feb-4054-a0b6-de4fd022982f.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to wait and ponder. If you fail, you must act

f04fd0e5-e4a1-42a4-b9d4-eab9402d35cf.name: Sadism
f04fd0e5-e4a1-42a4-b9d4-eab9402d35cf.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you have an opportunity to indulge your desires and know you shouldn’t (e.g., because the prisoner is one who should be released unharmed). If you fail, you cannot restrain yourself.

features.situation: from those who become aware of your Sadism unless they are from a culture that holds life in little esteem

40a3781a-1373-40e1-9992-a65031195ff5.name: Trickster
40a3781a-1373-40e1-9992-a65031195ff5.notes: Make a self-control roll each day. If you fail, you must try to trick a dangerous subject: a skilled warrior, a dangerous monster, a whole group of reasonably competent opponents, etc. If you resist, you get a cumulative -1 per day to your self-control roll until you finally fail a roll!

4db94f45-8806-4c13-a8d5-5af6952e0121.name: Impulsiveness
4db94f45-8806-4c13-a8d5-5af6952e0121.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to wait and ponder. If you fail, you must act

73b956d8-7bc4-4280-bfb9-e3b7743ed10d.name: Likes to hang around with wizards

b31c6a9e-f9f3-4412-8f8b-7c061a9dbc04.name: Curious
b31c6a9e-f9f3-4412-8f8b-7c061a9dbc04.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with an interesting item or situation

2b6fa081-8c68-4146-9460-fd161efb8f1c.name: Imitative
2b6fa081-8c68-4146-9460-fd161efb8f1c.notes: Will habitually emulate other beings after spending a little time with them
